attributes.action: Please stop the posting of dead people on Facebook
attributes.background: Today i saw a picture of family hung from a bridge, can we  stop the posting of dead people/babies on Facebook, they will not ban it because they do not violate standards, they tell you to block the picture, but how can you block this image from your head?  sign and share this and get it stopped

rejection.details: This is a decision by Facebook, not the Government or Parliament.
